properties.description: Lumafield is a private computer hardware manufacturing company founded in 2019, headquartered in Cambridge, MA, with 141 employees (+50% YoY growth), $3M annual revenue, and $142.5M in total funding. It specializes in industrial CT scanners, AI-powered analysis software, and inspection tools that enable engineers to see inside products and detect flaws early, serving the manufacturing and engineering sectors.
properties.content:
[Skip to main content](https://www.lumafield.com/www.lumafield.com#main-content)

[Listen to Go/No-Go episode 2 featuring Bridgit Mendler >](https://www.lumafield.com/podcast/episode-002-bridgit-mendler)

## What isindustrial CT?

## The universal engineering tool

Industrial X-ray CT (Computed Tomography) works on the same basic principle as medical CT, taking hundreds of X-ray images from different angles to capture the internal and external structure of objects in three dimensions. Engineers and manufacturers are leveraging industrial CT to accelerate decision-making and time-to-market while also saving millions of dollars on destructive testing, prototyping, and potential recalls.

[How does it work?](https://www.lumafield.com/article/what-is-industrial-ct)

[**Scanner**\
\
**Neptune** \
\
**Neptune — Lab CT Scanner**](https://www.lumafield.com/www.lumafield.com#neptune) [**Scanner**\
\
**Triton** \
\
****Triton** — Factory CT Scanner**](https://www.lumafield.com/www.lumafield.com#triton) [**Software**\
\
**Voyager** \
\
**Voyager — Cloud-based analysis software**](https://www.lumafield.com/www.lumafield.com#voyager)

## Accelerate product development

## Neptune

### Lab ct scanner

Save time by catching and fixing flaws at the outset. The Neptune industrial X-ray CT scanner is an easy-to-use frontline engineering tool. Use it to accelerate every stage of your product development process, from R&D through production.

[Bring X-ray CT in-house](https://www.lumafield.com/products/neptune-industrial-x-ray-ct-scanner)

## Inspect at scale

## Triton

### factory ct scanner

Until now, industrial CT has been too slow and expensive for production applications. Lumafield’s automated Triton scanner can now run thousands of CT scans per shift, unlocking countless production applications.

[Discover Ultra-Fast CT](https://www.lumafield.com/products/triton-production-ready-automated-ct-inspection)

## Empower your team

## Voyager

### cloud-based analysis software

Transform 3D and CT scan data into actionable insights on our collaborative browser-based platform. Compare your part to its CAD model, take precise measurements, then share the results in seconds—all in a web browser, with no software to install.

[Upload your first project](https://www.lumafield.com/products/voyager-ai-powered-cloud-analysis-software)

# Trusted by great engineering teams

[See all case studies](https://www.lumafield.com/case-studies)

[See all case studies](https://www.lumafield.com/case-studies)

company.name: Lumafield
company.about:
Lumafield helps engineering teams work at the speed of light. Lumafield's Voyager analysis software and Atlas AI co-pilot find answers quickly and facilitate collaboration. Lumafield's Neptune industrial CT scanner arms engineers with X-ray vision, allowing them to look inside their products, inspect invisible features, and pinpoint problems before they reach customers.

Founded in 2019, our team includes world-class researchers and industrial designers, PhDs, founders of successful startups, and zero egos.

The company is headquartered in Boston, MA and has an office in San Francisco, CA.

properties.description: Manufacturing company specializing in high-performance, rare-earth-free permanent magnets; 88 employees (+36.4% YoY growth), $10M annual revenue, founded in 2015, headquartered in Minneapolis, MN; has raised $161.6M in total funding, including a recent debt financing round in January 2025; focuses on industries such as automotive, industrial motors, defense, and medical devices.

###### Applications

# The world runs on permanent magnets

[**Industrial Motors & Generators**](https://www.nironmagnetics.com/)

### From consumer electronics to the motors powering industry, permanent magnets are the invisible force that converts electricity to motion in the devices you use every day.

### At Niron Magnetics, we produce the world’s only high performance, rare-earth-free permanent magnets. Our Iron Nitride magnet technology and world-leading magnetics expertise enhance the applications that use magnets to help revolutionize your industry.

## Industrial Motors & Generators

### → HVAC Systems → Pumps, Fans, Compressors → Manufacturing Automation → Medical Devices

###### Solutions

# **The global supply chain is vulnerable. We secure** **vital industries by reshaping domestic magnet production.**

## Secure.

## Secure.

## Secure.

### Zero rare earths. Zero critical minerals. The raw materials for our magnets are globally abundant and 100% domestically sourced. This creates a permanently secure supply chain.

### Zero rare earths. Zero critical minerals. The raw materials for our magnets are globally abundant and 100% domestically sourced. This creates a permanently secure supply chain.

## Powerful.

### Advanced performance. Iron Nitride has the greatest flux of any material known and unlocks fundamental advantages in device design. Our magnets make technologies better.

## Sustainable.

## Sustainable.

## Sustainable.

### Clean by design. Our closed-loop manufacturing process sets the standard for sustainable magnet production and bypasses the rare earth supply chain. We use iron and nitrogen - clean and simple.

###### OUR COMPANY

# Magnets Made in Minnesota

###### (Conceptual Design)

### Niron Magnetics is reshaping American manufacturing. We saw the problems caused by rare earth dependence and took a fundamentally different approach, reconceptualizing how magnets can be made. Our groundbreaking Iron Nitride technology was born at the University of Minnesota, then developed and manufactured right here in Minnesota.

### The result is a more secure and sustainable supply chain, and a material that unlocks innovation in magnet-using devices. With facilities clean enough to sit in the heart of cities, and our world-class team of experts, we are creating the future of magnetics.

properties.description: Environmental services company specializing in CO₂ removal and storage; 72 employees, $8.7M annual revenue, $69M funding, founded 2019 in Switzerland; works with construction waste recyclers, urban miners, and industrial CO₂ sources to achieve net-zero emissions by 2050.
properties.content:
[Skip to content](https://www.neustark.com/www.neustark.com#main)

Who we work with

[Recyclers: concrete & construction materials](https://www.neustark.com/en/recyclers-concrete-construction-materials) [Urban miners: slag & IBA processors](https://www.neustark.com/en/urban-miners-slag-and-iba-processors) [Concrete producers](https://www.neustark.com/en/concrete-producers) [CO2 sources](https://www.neustark.com/en/co2-sources) [Businesses with climate targets](https://www.neustark.com/en/businesses-with-climate-targets)

What do we do

[Our mission: negative emissions for net zero](https://www.neustark.com/en/our-mission-negative-emissions-for-net-zero) [Our solution: mineralization](https://www.neustark.com/en/our-solution-mineralization) [Our impact: carbon dioxide removal](https://www.neustark.com/en/our-impact-carbon-dioxide-removal)

About us

[Get to know us](https://www.neustark.com/en/get-to-know-us) [Meet the team](https://www.neustark.com/en/meet-the-team) [News](https://www.neustark.com/en/news)

[Careers](https://www.neustark.com/en/careers) [Get in touch](https://www.neustark.com/en/get-in-touch)

ENDEFR

Follow us

Contact us

[Get in touch](https://www.neustark.com/en/get-in-touch)

# We remove CO2 from the atmosphere – **and store it permanently**

[4537tonnes of CO2 net removed](https://www.neustark.com/en/our-impact-carbon-dioxide-removal) [39capture and storage sites in operation](https://www.neustark.com/en/get-to-know-us#map)

[4537tonnes of CO2 net removed](https://www.neustark.com/en/our-impact-carbon-dioxide-removal) [39capture and storage sites in operation](https://www.neustark.com/en/get-to-know-us#map)

## What we do

Demolished concrete is the world’s largest waste stream. Neustark turns this waste stream into a carbon sink. We’ve created and deployed a solution that binds CO2 in demolished concrete aggregate through mineralization – thus permanently storing it and removing the CO2 from the atmosphere.

We work with biogas plants to source our CO2, concrete recyclers to store the CO2, and companies with ambitious climate strategies on their journey to net zero, who acquire our CDR (carbon dioxide removal) credits.

In a nutshell: we permanently remove CO2 and thus generate negative emissions.

We are currently scaling up across the globe – on our way to removing hundreds of thousands of tonnes of CO2 in this decade, and beyond that.

## Get to know us, our team and our technology

Watch Video

## Who we work with

### Construction & demolition waste recyclers

We partner with you to pioneer a new field. Our technology is embedded at your site – alongside your existing business model and operations. Our partnership helps you to optimize your baseline.

[How can we partner up?](https://www.neustark.com/en/recyclers-concrete-construction-materials)

### CO2 sources

We partner with you to valorize your CO2 emission volumes, today. This helps you to generate additional income, helps us to capture CO2 to permanently store – and, ultimately, helps the climate.

[Why should we join forces?](https://www.neustark.com/en/co2-sources)

### Businesses with climate targets

We help you to achieve your net zero climate strategy by removing your hard to abate emissions. Neustark’s carbon removal (CDR) is permanent, verified, and measurable.

[Let's take climate action together!](https://www.neustark.com/en/businesses-with-climate-targets)

## The process

## Why we do it

By removing CO2from the atmosphere and storing it in demolition concrete permanently, neustark's technology generates negative emissions.

Reducing the emissions we produce across the globe is crucial – but to reach our climate goals, carbon removal is also indispensable.

For a bright future of all generations on our planet.

[Why carbon removal is important](https://www.neustark.com/en/our-mission-negative-emissions-for-net-zero)

## How we do it

Neustark captures, transports and stores CO2 by working with source (e.g. biogas plants) and storage (i.e. concrete recyclers) partners located in close proximity to each other.

Our mineralization technology binds the CO2 in demolished concrete, thus removing it permanently.

Businesses at the forefront of climate action buy our CDR, which, alongside their reduction efforts, helps them to achieve net-zero.

It’s a win-win-win for our partners and clients, and ultimately and most importantly, the planet and all generations.

[This is how it works](https://www.neustark.com/en/our-solution-mineralization)

> **We enable permanent CO2 storage** – for a bright future of all generations on our planet.

## Our network of trusted partners, clients, and organizations

## Latest news

Blog

03.09.25
12 min read

### London’s iconic Skyline could be the secret formula to unlock Construction’s circular economy in the UK

Using the world’s largest waste stream - demolition concrete - as a carbon sink offers a transformative solution to lock away residual CO2 within new buildings.

Find out more

Press release

26.08.25
7 min read

### Neustark and Swiss sign multi-year carbon removal agreement

SWISS becomes neustark’s first CDR partner from the aviation industry.

Find out more

Case Studies

13.08.25
9 min read

### Practical application in Berlin shows: carbonated recycled concrete is in no way inferior to conventional concrete

The Friedenauer Höhe is the first large residential construction project where carbonated recycled concrete has been used.

Find out more

## Interested in connecting with us at neustark?

[Contact us today](https://www.neustark.com/en/get-in-touch)

company.name: neustark
company.about:
Limiting global warming to 1.5°C implies reaching net zero CO2 emissions in 2050 according to the IPCC. Next to substantially reducing emissions, this target will only be possible by globally deploying carbon removal (CDR) solutions at the scale of billions of tons of CO2. Neustark is a leading provider in this rapidly growing field, having developed a solution to permanently store CO2 from the air in recycled mineral waste such as demolished concrete. 

Our first solutions have been deployed in Switzerland and Europe and are already capturing and storing tons of CO2 every week. We are currently scaling up our operations and carbon removal impact globally – on the road to removing one million tons of CO2 in 2030, and beyond that. 

Founded in 2019, neustark AG is based in Berne, Switzerland, and is a team of around 55 people (as per Q3 2023) working at our Berne, Zurich and Cologne offices. Together, we enable permanent CO2 storage for a bright future of all generations on our planet.

What we do in a nutshell: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=joVBNV9O2MA
